item.title: 放了34天的華堡 HUGO
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: %!s(<!-- raw HTML omitted -->)<!-- raw HTML omitted -->放了34天的華堡 近日，全球連鎖速食龍頭漢堡王推出了一支廣告影片，裡頭呈現了漢堡王的招牌餐點華堡(Whopper)從新鮮出爐到放置了 34天後的模樣，藉此讓消費者知道華堡裡頭沒有添加人工防腐劑，適合講究健康的消費者 大快朵頤。 2020/2/29 星期六 下午 02:59:29 漢堡王 華堡 人工防腐劑 青春永駐的冰島漢堡 回到漢堡王的「發霉漢堡」，與之對比、最讓人印象深刻的要屬麥當勞在 2009年於冰島結束營業後，留下來的漢堡和薯條。 該漢堡和薯條在冰島放了十年後，外表只有稍稍縮水，並不像漢堡王的華堡發霉嚴重，人們也把這青春不老的漢堡和薯條放進展示櫃中，讓慕名前來的遊客都能與它們合影。

item.title: 紫丸日文慣用語-(交通受阻而)無法通行 的日文
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: %!s(<!-- raw HTML omitted -->)<!-- raw HTML omitted -->##足が奪われる（あしがうばわれる）## (交通受阻而)無法通行 例句：電車が故障で足が奪われる。(因為電車故障所以無法通行。) 詳細意思：指因為交通工具發生問題，使得通勤、通學受阻。

item.title: QQQ
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: %!s(<!-- raw HTML omitted -->)<!-- raw HTML omitted -->【遊戲名稱】：戰爭派對/Warparty v1.1.3 【遊戲類型】：模擬策略 【遊戲語言】：官方簡中 【遊戲平台】：PC 【解壓密碼】：my name 【檔案大小】：2.08 GB 解壓後 4.51 GB 【執行說明】：執行"warparty.exe” 【遊戲介紹】： 《Warparty》是一款以石器時代為背景的即時戰略遊戲。 你可以在遊戲中建立自己的基地，招募和管理一隊士兵， 對戰和馴服兇猛的恐龍，並指揮作戰流程。妥善管理資源、 技能以及地圖意識能夠幫助你大獲全勝。

item.title: The Story Hugo Theme
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story is a beautiful responsive Hugo blog theme with powerful extra features out-of-the-box. It’s targeted to people who want to showcase their technical work online.

item.title: Story's Theme Features
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: This page is a tour of Story’s features, so you can take full advantage of its power.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Story has a lot of features, but most are optional and have smart defaults! This page is an introduction to Story, with links to further pages that go into more details. There’s also a listing of features that either don’t need a separate documentation page, or just don’t have full documentation yet.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Feature Flags
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story comes with a lot of power, but it’s all configurable: almost every extra feature is optional.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Feature flags, which are called <!-- raw HTML omitted -->classes<!-- raw HTML omitted --> in the markup, control many of Story’s features. You can enable and disable them in your site config, or in an individual post’s front matter. This article documents Story’s feature flags.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Author Profiles
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: With Story, you can define global and per-item author profiles/biographies.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Story supports author profiles, so you can highlight your bio. It’s possible to set this globally for the entire site, or individually for each piece of content. Or you can set a global default and override it on individual pieces of content. Scroll to the bottom of any page on this site to see how author profiles are styled.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Figures, Captions, and Tables
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: This article shows you how to enhance your images and tables with features such as captions and alternative stylings.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Story can automatically transform images into figures with captions. It can also add captions to tables. And it adds features and styling to both images and tables. This article is a demo of Story’s features for figures, tables, and captions.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's JavaScript Search
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: With Story, your site will have built-in search with no external dependencies.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->This article documents Story’s built-in search features, which don’t rely on external search engines. Story uses the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->LunrJS<!-- raw HTML omitted --> library to provide fast browser-based search. This page first explains how search setup works, and then provides copy-paste ready code samples for you to use.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: 故事的圖片
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story gives you extra control over image formatting using only Markdown syntax.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->This article is a demo of Story’s image-related features (other than <!-- raw HTML omitted -->figure captions<!-- raw HTML omitted -->). Story can apply a variety of stylistic and layout transformations to your images. These features are enabled by unobtrusive, accessibility-friendly tricks that give you more control over images than Markdown typically provides. Story also has out-of-the-box support for header and preview images, for a visually stunning site.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Music Notation
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story can render music notation in your website.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->Story uses the <!-- raw HTML omitted -->abcjs<!-- raw HTML omitted --> library to transform <!-- raw HTML omitted -->abc<!-- raw HTML omitted --> music notation into “sheet music” dynamically. This works well for displaying a wide variety of music notation in a web browser conveniently, without embedding images or PDFs or the like.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Mathematical Equation Typesetting
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: If you ever write equations or mathematical formulas, Story has the features you need.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->This article is a demo of Story’s ability to typeset mathematical equations, both inline and in block form.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Story's Typography
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story uses gorgeous typefaces and is optimized for a pleasant reading experience on any device.This article is a demo of Story’s beautiful typography.

item.title: Story's MailChimp Integration Features
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story makes it easy to grow a MailChimp subscriber list and send beautifully formatted emails to them automatically.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->If you’re a blogger, you might use MailChimp to build a subscriber list, and Story makes that easy. MailChimp also has the ability to automatically send your new content to the list from an RSS feed, and guess what—Story helps you create an RSS feed customized just for that if you like, too.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: Creating Beautiful Presentations with Story
item.author: 紫丸
item.description: Story’s Remark frameworks help you create sophisticated slides with simple, clean Markdown. There are predefined layouts for most presentation needs, beautiful typography and colors, precise image control, and a simple modular way to create custom layouts.<!-- raw HTML omitted --><!-- raw HTML omitted -->This is a “talk” page in Story, which is the permanent homepage for a talk you’ve given at a specific event. It’s designed to showcase your appearance by bringing together information about the event, along with your slides and extra information like a video of your talk. In this way you can build a portfolio of your speaking history.<!-- raw HTML omitted -->
